sentences.sentence: Our company mainly produces various specifications and greige cotton fabrics, T/C fabric.
sentences.translation: 我公司主要生产各种规格和坯布的棉织物，涤纶占主体比例的涤棉布织物。

sentences.sentence: Requirements of the gray fabric quality to greige yarn quality.
sentences.translation: 给出坯布质量对原纱质量的要求。

sentences.sentence: Our company mainly produces various specifications and greige cotton fabrics, T / C fabric.
sentences.translation: 我公司主要生产各种规格全棉面料及坯布、T/C坯布。
